featured.text: The encouraging response to McCarroll’s show confirmed that change is happening in fashion.
Women have been found to ask more questions, make more use of positive and encouraging “noises,” use a wider range of intonation patterns, and make greater use of the pronouns “you” and “we.”

definition.en_def: Providing support, confidence, or hope to someone.
definition.example: Her encouraging words helped me to pursue my dreams.
